name: Lion-O (Red)
description: Lions. Many People have differing opinions about lions. Some say they are to be feared, while others say they should be revered. Both are probably right. The lion has often been a symbol of fear to many people because of their incredible power; yet, the lion is also known as the “King Of The Animal World.” He’s kind of like a human king: he has all the power, but if you respect him, you have nothing to worry about—you have no reason to fear his power. In many ways, we should treat people like lions: treat everyone with respect and you will have nothing to fear from them.

name: Classical (Black)
description: It’s hard to find something to respect. In today’s world, nearly anything goes, any you can get away with nearly anything and everything. But there’s more to life than what you can get away with. Life’s not about getting away, life is about giving away. This was one of Matthias Clothing’s very first printed shirts. We are almost out of stock on these, and once they are gone, they will NEVER BE PRINTED AGAIN ! So grab one while you can, or you may just miss your chance!

name: Painted? On Shirts!
description: Painting is something that people tend to dislike, mostly for two reasons: it requires hard work and it requires getting dirty. Unfortunately, people take that kind of attitude and apply it to relationships. People are afraid to reach out to people because they are afraid of the cost of getting involved, as well as the work it requires to be a friend. In order for somebody to reach anybody, they need to meet them where they are at, as well as take a risk of being a part of that person’s life. People tend to forget that, despite the hard work and messyness involved in painting, that the end will justify the pain it took to get you there.
